name: What do you do with all your (in-game) gold? (Possible spoiler for those who haven't played OC past chapter 1)
author: NobleSky

posts.author: NobleSky
posts.content:
I just replayed OC again. Currently I'm near the end of chapter 2 in Luskan before entering the Wizard's Tower. When I started chapter 2, my total gold was around 15k to 20k gold-ish. In my current position, my total gold ballooned to around 240k gold. Not sure if this is a feature or bug because my current game is VERY generous to loots. I didn't think the past version of Nwn was as generous as mine in term of loot drop. I guess I could :
1. Buy more potions or equipment
2. Save for future chapter because more valuable and expensive equipment are sure to come, right? RIGHT?
